item.title: This overlooked group of stocks might be your portfolio’s missing piece
item.description: Midcap stocks can stand up to the market’s megacap giants

item.title: I’m retiring at 63 with $1.5 million saved. Is 70/30 equities/bonds too risky?
item.description: “My spouse and I have a combined $5,500 in monthly Social Security payments and a $2,900-a-month pension.”

item.title: Firefly Aerospace’s stock has lost its shine, as the company’s first earnings report disappoints
item.description: Shares of Firefly Aerospace were tumbling to trade below the IPO price following the space-exploration company’s first quarterly results.

item.title: My boyfriend, 69, moved in. He refuses to pay more than $1,300 in rent and won’t do yard work. What should I do?
item.description: “It’s clear that he seems to think that if I die, that he should inherit the house. That is NOT my plan.”

item.title: ‘I changed my will to deter vultures’: I’m in my 60s and disabled. Do I impoverish myself to qualify for Medicaid?
item.description: “I pay my taxes and insurance, donate money and personal belongings.”
